alert.note: Alert for Delta (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued April 21 at 1:33PM EDT until further notice by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Marquette has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Michigan... Sturgeon River near Nahma Junction affecting Delta County. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/marquette. The next statement will be issued by Saturday afternoon at 200 PM EDT. && ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Elevated river levels caused by rain runoff is occurring. * WHERE...Sturgeon River near Nahma Junction. * WHEN...From this afternoon until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Water overflows the banks along the river * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 AM EDT Friday the stage was 8.8 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Action stage is 8.0 feet. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
